ValidationRule.description: Requires ESA Field Section be completed on JPM Plans
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , "Ancillary Billing Flat Fee")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Type , "Ancillary Billing Hourly Rate")) && ISPICKVAL( LeadSourceDetail__c , "JPM" ) && ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "401(k)") && ( ISBLANK(TEXT( Advisor_Fees_Paid_from_ESA__c )) || ISBLANK(TEXT( Ubiquity_Admin_Fees_Paid_by_ESA__c )) || ISBLANK(TEXT( Participant_Fees_Paid_from_ESA__c )) ) && CloseDate > DATE(2017,1,9)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All fields in the ERISA Spend Account section must have a Yes or No value and cannot be blank.
